data.author: Robert Brault
data.quote: Eventually soul mates meet, for they have the same hiding place.

data.author: Lemony Snicket
data.quote: Do the scary thing first, and get scared later.

data.author: Patrick Stump
data.quote: When you have a bad day, a really bad day, try and treat the world better than it treated you.

data.author: Andrea Gibson
data.quote: You are not weak just because your heart feels so heavy.

data.author: Thomas Jefferson
data.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

data.author: Viktor E. Frankl
data.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.

data.author: Walt Disney Company
data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking ans begin doing.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

data.author: Ernest Barbaric
data.quote: Create. Not for the money. Not for the fame. Not for the recognition. But for the pure joy of creating something and sharing it.

data.author: Amit Ray
data.quote: Champions extend their limits and make things happen.

data.author: RMV
data.quote: Anyone can exist. Most fools do. It takes guts to truly Live.

data.author: William Shakespeare
data.quote: Pour on, I will endure.

data.author: Viet Thanh Nguyen
data.quote: This feat I also had no idea how to accomplish, but ignorance had never stopped me from taking action before.

data.author: Lailah Gift Akita
data.quote: Sacred joy exists in any suffering.

data.author: Kalon Jackson
data.quote: Many people will try to Sell you a Dream, its Your place to let them know you Already have one

data.author: Suzy Kassem
data.quote: You cannot move things by not moving.

data.author: Mohith Agadi
data.quote: Butterflies don't know their wings' Colors, but others see their Splendor.

data.author: Sharfaraz Ahmed
data.quote: If you want to be successful, put yourself in a discomfort zone.

data.author: Dean Wilson
data.quote: Sometimes all the players get a bad hand. You just have to be determined enough to see the game through.
